title: Shopify Store Cloner (Shrine Theme or Gempage) –
job_overview:
We’re looking for a Shopify VA or developer who can rebuild Shopify stores using the Shrine or GemPages theme, replicating the homepage, product page, and overall layout exactly as the reference site.

You’ll be responsible for recreating 1 store per day, maintaining visual accuracy and mobile responsiveness.

We value precision, speed, and reliability — and we want to build a long-term partnership with someone who is consistent and takes ownership of their work.

?

???? Key Responsibilities:
	•	Clone existing Shopify stores using Shrine or GemPages (1 per day)
	•	Recreate homepage, product pages, layout, fonts, spacing – pixel perfect
	•	Upload content and images from the reference store
	•	Ensure full mobile optimization and fast performance
	•	Communicate clearly and ask for clarification when needed

?

? Requirements:
	•	Experience with Shrine or GemPages on Shopify (mandatory)
	•	High attention to detail and ability to follow design exactly
	•	Able to deliver 1 store per day
	•	Familiarity with Shopify admin, themes, and basic Liquid/CSS (preferred)
	•	Stable internet and availability to work daily

?

? Nice to Have:
	•	Experience with other Page Builders like PageFly
	•	Background in dropshipping or e-commerce

?

???? Work Structure & Growth Opportunity:

We will start on a per-store (project-based) model. If you are consistent and deliver high-quality work, we will transition you to a full-time, long-term position.

Your income will grow based on your reliability and consistency. The more stable and precise your work is, the more we will rely on you — and reward you accordingly.

?

???? To Apply:

Please send:
• Examples of Shopify stores you have built using Shrine or GemPages
• Your expected rate per store (fixed price, not hourly or monthly)
• A short message confirming that you can deliver 1 store per day
